place.name: WARDLEWORTH
place.gazetteerText: WARDLEWORTH, a township in Rochdale parish, Lancashire; including large part of Rochdale borough. Real property, £61,924; of which £1,060 are in mines, and £559 in gasworks. Pop. in 1851, 14,103; in 1861, 17,840. Houses, 3,534. Pop. of the R. borough part in 1861, 16,531. Houses, 3,272. See Hundersfield. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)

unit.name: WARDLEWORTH ST MARY WITH ST JAMES
